channel.title: You Don’t Say on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in You Don’t Say on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: OpenAI Designed GPT-5 to Be Safer. It Still Outputs Gay Slurs
item.description: The new version of ChatGPT explains why it won’t generate rule-breaking outputs. WIRED’s initial analysis found that some guardrails were easy to circumvent.
